titleStmt.title: Joel Gordon et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG1786

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p:
To his Excellency
Thos E. Bramlette, Govr of Ky

The undersigned citizens of Washington County Kentucky in precinct No 3 of said county (Pottsville district No 3) would respectfully petition you that their has occured a vacancy in the ^office^ of ^one of^ the Justice^s^ of the peace, by the resignation of Joshua Smalley Esqr, We therefore would peittion your Excellency for the appointment of S. B. Montgomery as a gentleman in every respect suitable to fill the vacancy occured by the aforesaid resgination.

Joel Gordon
J. T. Gordon
T. C. Rinehard
J. Cocanougher
J. Cocanougher
Henry H Cocanougher
Marion Brady
John C. Paddock
John Young
Mrs L. Young
H Cocanougher
H Lawson
Wm H Best
Mandavill Elliott
J. C. Campbell
W. T. Campbell
Geo C. Martin
T. O. Campbell
George S. Goode
Jacob Hafhey
John Arnold
John White
Henry Hilton
W. J. Junnan
George Cocanougher
F. M. Cocanougher
A. J. Cocanougher
H Graham Canary
